entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink: Trimmer and NativeAOT do not trim branches based on DoesNotReturnAttribute behavior #102677
  • Reduce potential false sharing for static fields (sync objects) #102675
  • Native AOT linux-bionic build is uploading duplicate packages #102672
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Employ `allows ref struct` in libraries #102671
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Vector Embedding Type #102669
  • `MemoryCache`'s unhandled exception handler disposes a timer that takes a lock and can lead to deadlock #102666
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #102665
  • MT-System.Threading.Tests timeout #102664
    9.0.0
  • System.ArgumentException: The supplied System.Net.SocketAddress is an invalid size for the System.Net.IPEndPoint end point. (Parameter 'socketAddress') on OSX #102663
  • System.Collections.Generic.List<T> constructor overload for initializing with pre-determined "size" #102662
  • Visual Studio crashes when disabling form.ShowInTaskbar and calling form.ShowDialog at DesignTime in .Netcore #102660
  • [API Proposal]: Expose overloads of HttpContent.LoadIntoBufferAsync taking a CancellationToken #102659
  • Long individual GC pauses: how to investigate? #102657
  • Dependency injection: FromKeyedServiceAttribute falls back to last defined unkeyed service of the type -- unexpected behavior? #102654
  • Counter generated from System.Diagnostic.Metrics resets to zero. #102653
  • Dependency Injection: Conforming container tests missing a test for assumed provided instance disposal behaviour #102651
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Connect_WithData_OK #102650
  • [android][infra] Flaky x64 Android failures in PayloadGroup0, failed to install mobile app #102646
    9.0.0
  • Parameter types of pinvoke callback method 'System.Int32 _PDG(Silk.NET.SDL.PfnMallocFunc, Silk.NET.SDL.PfnCallocFunc, Silk.NET.SDL.PfnReallocFunc, Silk.NET.SDL.PfnFreeFunc)' needs to be blittable. #102644
    9.0.0
  • Regex parser regression #102643

Closed

  • CompileToAssembly_SimpleUseInDebug test failure on windows amd64 #100964
  • [Feature Request] Provide Catch Handler Found notifications for async exceptions re-caught in library code #12488
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `GetLongOffset` and `GetLongOffsetAndLength` #102114
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Memory Corruption #102046
    9.0.0
  • WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102157
    9.0.0
  • Use of AssemblyNameInfo is wrong in TraceRuntimeDescToTypeSystemDesc #102630
  • Rsa.Encrypt() is retuning "Error occurred during a cryptographic operation" after migration from .net6 to .net8 #102620
  • I'm sorry I couldn't provide more feedback. In the end, the issue seems to be resolved now (too bad we never figured out the source of it). But thanks to anyone involved for the time. #102642
  • Incorrect configuration mapping #102609
  • Positional record cannot handle in-memory array configuration #78771
    Future
  • Trimmer fails with IL1012 when building a MAUI app #100357
  • Debug build errors out #102618
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fill in FeatureCheckDataflow.cs assertions with issue links #102679
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • Minimally allow Vector.Shuffle to expand for values that become constant by global morph #102676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • fix connect test extension #102668
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • MeterListener.Dispose always disables measurements #102661
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Baseline tests in CoreMangLib subtree #102648
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete test testing a weird delegate implementation detail #102647
    needs-area-label
  • Stop guessing if a type is blittable #102645
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102641
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102640
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102639
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 3 #102592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] reenable APC2 use on arm64 #102667
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#102469. #102638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/6.0] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102588
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102582
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102570
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Update implicit versions for 6,7,8 #102607
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Couple fixes to scanning fields #102649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Sdk not installer flow for wasm build tests #102624
    area-Workloads
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102366
    arch-wasm
  • Fix assembly name parsing in dotnet-pgo tool #102634
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix build break on osx/arm64 Debug #102631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 9.0 preview 4 #102604
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Don't use direct wrapper when invoking cctors, so all cctors can share one wrapper #102375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect gchandle #102637
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move Disposal of QuicStream to the Http3Connection Prototype #102597
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Don't allocate the renamable vars buffer in the interpreter unless optimizing #102563
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Length guard in ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.RemoveRange #102484
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Allow Time in ISO strings when deserializing DateOnly #102627
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Figure out which package other repos should use to subscribe to the sdk version #41156
  • How to integrate dotnet/installer into SDK and download the latest unpublished preview version, such as SDK release 9.0.100-preview6.xxxx for macOS's pkg file? #41137

Closed

  • ILLink_links_simple_app_without_analysis_warnings_and_it_runs failing in 8.0.1xx #40882
  • HotReloadProfileReader has O(2^N) performance issue #36356
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With 7.0.317 SDK installed, .Net Host will stop working when creating F# mvc/webapi project. #41076

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41165
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to may implicit version #41164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enhancements to Pull Request Creation/Update in `CreateBaselineUpdatePR` Tool #41160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41159
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Add back Microsoft.Dotnet.Sdk.Internal project #41155
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back Microsoft.Dotnet.Sdk.Internal project #41154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add SmokeTestsLicenseScanPath prop for LicenseScan Test #41143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Merged

  • Re-enable test that was blocking codeflow #41135
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Draft of a workload diagnostic document #40912
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update to 8.0.3, 4, and then 5 to prep 8.0.4xx for insertions #41134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • preview 6 branding #41099
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update init-source-only.proj #41132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes O(2^N) problem in HotReloadProfileReader #36356 #36357
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • FreeBSD: simplify GetOSVersion #40842
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • List `win-x86` under known runtime packs for AOT #41130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid implicit conversion from long to int #73698
  • "Use primary constructor" does not produce a diagnostic for an empty public parameterless constructor #73695
  • Allow manually forcing a refresh of the IntelliSense database #73693
  • Compile Error After Upgrading - SDK 8.0.300 - 'Class1' does not contain a definition for 'DisposeAsync' #73691
  • A potential bug in custom string interpolation constructor resolving for `ref` parameters #73690
  • Scripting API - Operation is not supported on this platform. (when AOT published) #73689

Closed

  • Taghelpers break build on 8.0.300 with various errors (major impact, Area-Compilers) #73611
  • Allow manually forcing a refresh of the IntelliSense database #73694
  • StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces - Roslyn does not warn that a most-derived static interface method implementation will not be used #73686
  • Cannot define a raw string literal ending in double-quote #73677

PullRequests

Created

  • On-the-fly-docs content exclusion #73702
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update tagging to avoid jumping back to the UI thread when finished. #73699
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restore RazorCompiler EA layer for desktop #73697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • #66387 Update SyntaxGenerator.cs #73696
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73683
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Utilize ImmutableCollectionsMarshal to get ROS for XxHash128.Hash call #73692
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Return the SignatureHelp items nearest to the cursor #73606
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Final editor side changes for "allow ref struct" support #73700
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we sync source-generator versions over properly when doing a cone-sync #73688
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce cost of syntactic classification by around 25% while paging down through a file (and around 50% while arrowing down). #73673
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid having to go back to the UI thread in the navbar code #73681
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include more data for debugging purposes #73684
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert interval-tree type to a struct #73676
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add support for or-pattern in `IDE0010` #73574
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #55874
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #55873
  • Perf regression: mapaction #55872
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55871
  • Blazor WebAssembly does not work after upgrade #55870
  • Binding is not working in VS2022 #55869
  • WebApplicationFactory has content root issue when running tests on WSL2 #55867
  • Automatically add enctype="multipart/form-data" when there is a file input #55866
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55861

Closed

  • Issue using server-side model binding with `EditForm` in `OnParametersSetAsync` method #55868
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #55859
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55860
  • Make Blazor More Extensible #55853
  • x #55863
  • Blazor pages from RCL does not work in net8 #55843
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #55856
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55841
  • Cannot supply a component of type 'Components.BookComponent' because the current platform does not support the render mode 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.InteractiveServerRenderMode' #55728

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport #51506 to .NET 8 #55865
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 8.0.x
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Unquarantine HtmlGenerationWithCultureTest.CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions #55858
    area-mvc
  • Unquarantine FrameworkParametersCompletionProviderTests #55857
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `33af80a` to `9b4993c` #55864
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [browser] Support separation hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #55716
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Page Memory Leak #22645
  • [Mac Catalyst] DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfo is not refreshed #22642
    Backlog
  • Add support for multiple displays in DeviceDisplay #22641
    Backlog
  • CollectionView: Adding groups leads to "IndexOutOfBoundsException: Inconsistency detected" #22638
    Backlog
  • Binding Border.StrokeShape RoundRectangle CornerRadius not working #22637
    Backlog
  • Unable to style focus using physical keyboard on collectionview #22636
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged event not getting raised #22634
    Backlog
  • ListView Scrolled event is not triggered #22630
    Backlog

Closed

  • Border width not updated if device was rotated [Regression] #22639
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Crash on iOS when initializing a TabbedPage without children #22633
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Determine which Essentials work in Windows Unpackaged apps #8552
    Backlog
  • MauiIcon Color has no effect #22534
  • Images do not layout correctly in Mac and iOS #22479
  • Make Toolbar public #22629
  • AppX Deployment operation failed for package XXXX with error 0x80073CFB. The specific error text for this failure is: Another user has already installed an unpackaged version of this app. The current user cannot replace this with a packaged version. The conflicting package is XXX and it was published by CN=User Name. #21632
  • Essentials should work in Windows Packaged (MSIX) apps #8553
    Backlog
  • Rendering Failure of Custom Controls on Mopup Page in Android Due to Clipping Issue #21056
  • [MAUI][.NET9] Searching on the “Search all recipes page” will cause the app to crash. #21033
  • The "ProjectReference" rule is missing the "{ItemType}" property. When Publishing maui android app #22415
  • .net Maui: Memory Leak in iOS Controls not getting cleaned up #22376
  • WebView Ctrl+F find dialog doesn't show up in Release without debugger attached #22423
  • Design time type converters are needed #18383
  • Builds are significantly slower with Internet access #21532
  • The entry input cursor and the lower border line color have related properties that can be set directly. #21441
  • Seeing error The program '...Program Trace' has exited with code 0 (0x0) #21924
  • ScrollView with bindableLayout is not resized on Andorid #21634
  • SetTitleBar not working on Windows #22178
  • "Timespan.Days property not found" when production app released to iOS App Store #21930

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Windows] Fix code-style and minor perf improvements in `GesturePlatformManager.Windows.cs` #22632
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • Fixes endless loop of HorizontalScroll #22628
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Make sure to redraw the background drawable when the size is updated #22626
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing

Merged

  • Crash on iOS when initializing a TabbedPage without children - fix #22644
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Remove feature switch which is not necessary anymore #22524
    area-xaml

Updated

  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
  • Weak Parent #22561
    area-controls-general, t/perf
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • [testing] Try xunit 2.6.6 with 2.8.0 vs runner #22621
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Flyout Page support for IconImageSource #22099
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Provider - Why is Avg aggregate projection truncating precision? #33807
  • I want to keep the users navigation and roleUsers navigations at the same time not just users navigation #33803
  • Inconsistent exceptions while aggregating empty collections #33802
    Backlog

Closed

  • Global query filter not parameterised #33765
  • List Of List to JsonB .Net 8 #33805
  • In-memory sqlite crash depending on connection string style #33800
  • Concatenation in projection throws "System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection" #33410

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip Sqlite functional tests on MacOs #33809
  • Pass sequence annotations (#33780) #33804
  • attempt to track down sqlite issue #33801

Merged

  • Enable SQL baseline rewriting for Cosmos #33808
  • Clean up query translator/expression namespace and file placement #33782
  • Simplify `TRUE = expr` in filtering contexts #33776
  • Re-enable `GroupBy_aggregate_where_required_relationship` #33806

Updated

  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • When creating the "missing column" error message, use the same (case insensitive) column name comparer used in field value retrieval #33749

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The Runtime version of “ASP.NET Core Runtime” and “.NET Windows Desktop Runtime” in .NET 9.0 Preview 5 SDK are 9.0.0-preview.6.xxx. #19846
  • Can't install .NET6 runtime on Ubuntu 22.04 #19845

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add link to the sdk installer table #19844
